it.uniroma3.dia.gc

Class Compressor

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniroma3.dia.gc.Compressor

  • public class Compressor
extends Object

    This class allows to compress a parsed graph (file graph.parser).

    Version:
    0.3.1
    Author:
    Guido Drovandi

      • evaluate

        public static void evaluate(String graph,
                            boolean fast,
                            boolean simMode,
                            PrintStream info)
                     throws Exception
        Compress the file .parser associated with the graph.
        Parameters:
        graph - the name of the graph to be compressed (the file graph.parser must exists)
        fast - fast compression algorithm (worse compression ratio)
        simMode - do not write the compressed graph file
        info - the stream where to write information
        Throws:
        Exception

      • printStatistics

        public final void printStatistics(PrintStream out)
